page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT IN PRUDHOE
page.content: We surveyed on employment in Prudhoe. We asked the pupils at school whether they had parents working either at Kimberly Clark Paper Fractory or Prudhoe Hospital for mentally handicapped. These places employ the most people in Prodhoe. These are our results: Parents employed by Kimberly Clark 24% Parents employed by Prudhoe Hospital 26% Other places which employ large numbers of people are: Finnigans Paint Works, The Falcon Restaurant and Public House, Unifibres Paper Works, Insu Insulation, Thompsons Garage and Haulage and Tynedale District Council. In Prudhoe many people (especially school leavers) are unemployed. This might be because of workforce cutbacks and the closing down of factories.
